name: aev interactive
tagline: Affordable websites for business and non-profits
description:
We provide affordable web development and other online marketing services for small to mid-size businesses and non-profits in the United States and abroad. Our projects range from simple “brochure” WordPress websites of just a few pages to elaborate online stores with a large number of products. We also develop complex, custom coded web applications to solve very particular business problems. Our clients get lots more than just technical expertise.
We are seasoned business pros with decades of management experience in both large corporate environments and small business. Our founder and CEO, Norman L. Lawrence, Jr. has been involved with several entrepreneurial ventures ad was a corporate banker for almost twenty years. So, unlike most web design companies, we understand business! We make the effort to understand the priorities and objectives of each client which we combine with broad-based business experience, online marketing knowledge and website development expertise to produce online experiences that are effective, engaging, user-friendly and tailored to the achievement of specific goals
READ MORE...
